name: Texas Adult Drivers Ed for 18 - 24 years
short_description:
First-time driver's license applicants ages 18 to 24 will have to complete Texas Education Agency mandatory six-hour adult drivers education course to get a license in texas.

The Texas Adult Drivers Ed course contains information on highway signs; Texas traffic laws; alcohol and drug awareness; and distractions, such as driving while talking on a cell phone. Alcohol and drug awareness is also a major part of the course and you will learn how the effects of alcohol and drugs can influence your driving. Those who complete the course won't have to take the written exam but will have to pass the driving skills test.

Take Texas Adult Drivers Class online and obtain your drivers license in no time.
summary: Texas drivers license requirements for 18 -24 year olds
